name: Signs of Afterlife
description:
This game was made for the Area of Effect Game Jam 2021 with the theme of "signs of life".

Controls:

Wasd: Movement

Arrow Keys: Tend to Soul

Because this game uses the arrow keys I recommend playing in full screen mode to avoid scrolling your web browser with the arrow keys or otherwise disabling and arrow scrolling or other similar features on your browser. 

Credits:
Breakfish: Art, Code, and Sound
MarcKlopp: Art

One free Asset was used during this jam. the font Atlantis by FloodFonts.
https://www.1001fonts.com/atlantis-font.html
Everything else was created from scratch during the jam. We Hope you enjoy
